Title: Episode 3
Plot: Thomas is delighted to be put in charge of organising the church bazaar, but his enthusiasm is dampened when the vicar falls ill and Reverend Marley, a free-thinking curate, is sent to take his place. The postman soon becomes convinced the new arrival is evil - and as rumours start to spread about Marley's relationship with the Timmins family, Alf decides to investigate the cleric's murky past. Meanwhile, Dorcas and Laura worry about Gabriel's reaction to his dead wife's letter.
GuestStars: Burn Gorman (Torchwood's Owen Harper), with Mark Heap, Claudie Blakley and John Dagleish
